content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. What price were you considering for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student, so I am on a budget. How about 400 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's quite low for the location and the quality of the apartment. I'm looking for a price that reflects the value of the property. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable. How about 450 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's more in line with the market value, but still not quite what I'm looking for. I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us. Would you be willing to go a bit higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, how about 475 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's closer, but I'm hoping for a price that reflects the high demand for apartments in the city center. Would you be willing to go up to 500 Euro per month? It's a nice, round number.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds reasonable. I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
